short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gamify your online usage tracking. Display your daily usage and your average usage on the last 7 days.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tracking your daily usage of online surfing can be a tedious and boring task.
Let me introduce you Time Tracker Quest, an extension that will track your time for you and gamify the experience!
While seeing your character leveling up, you will be able to see your daily online usage on the last seven as well as the average on these days.
Beginning as a apprentice and become a powerful sorcerer mastering productivity!
